Name: Mauryans
History: Founded in 322 B.C. by Chandragupta Maurya, the Mauryan Empire was the first to rule most of the Indian subcontinent, and was one of the largest and most populous empires of antiquity. Its military featured bowmen who used the long-range bamboo longbow, fierce female warriors, chariots, and thousands of armored war elephants. Its philosophers, especially the famous Acharya Chanakya, contributed to such varied fields such as economics, religion, diplomacy, warfare, and good governance. Under the rule of Ashoka the Great, the empire saw 40 years of peace, harmony, and prosperity.

Technologies.Name: Pacifism (Reform)
Technologies.History: Regrets of the bloodshed or an effort to maintain his empire led Ashoka to support Buddhism and pacifism after slaughtering thousands of people during his early conquests.
Technologies.Description: Workers +15% all gather rates, Levy Infantry -10% hit points and attack.

Technologies.Name: Wootz Steel
Technologies.History: The Wootz steel is believed to have originated in India. There are several ancient Greek and Roman literary references to high-quality Indian steel since the time of Alexander's Indian campaign.'

Technologies.Name: Fire Protection
Technologies.History: To prevent major fires breaking out in their wooden cities, The Mauryans introduced permanent water deposits in every structure.'
Technologies.Description: Structures regenerate 2 hit points per second.

Heroes.Name: Elephant Archer
Heroes.History: Champion Ranged Elephant with fear aura.

CivBonuses.Name: Emperor of Emperors.
CivBonuses.History: The Mauryan Empire encompassed dozens of formerly independent kingdoms over an area of 5 million square kilometers, with a population of close to 60 million people. The Mauryan regents held the title Emperor of Emperors and commanded a standing army of 600,000 infantry, 9000 elephants, 8000 chariots, and 30,000 cavalry, making it arguably the largest army of its time.
CivBonuses.Description: Workers and Infantry -5 food cost for each phase researched.

CivBonuses.Name: Ancient Cities
CivBonuses.History: India was one of the first regions having huge settlements.

CivBonuses.Name: Indian Elephants
CivBonuses.History: Indian Elephants were larger and stronger than the north african ones most Mediterranean states used.

CivBonuses.Name: Bamboo Longbows
CivBonuses.History: India was a land of archery. The bulk of any Indian army was made up of highly skilled archers, armed with bamboo longbows.
CivBonuses.Description: Infantry Archers +50% attack but +33% attack rate.

CivBonuses.Name: Wooden Structures
CivBonuses.History: Mauryan structures were mostly made of wood. Consequently, their structures have less health than other cultures do, but they also construct faster.
CivBonuses.Description: Structures -20% build time, -20% hit points. Many Structures cost lumber instead of stone.

CivBonuses.Name: Light Infantry
CivBonuses.History: The majority of Indian infantrymen were hastely levied unarmored troops.
CivBonuses.Description: Levy Spearmen are significantly weaker, cheaper and faster trained.

TeamBonuses.Name: Elephant Abundance.
TeamBonuses.History: India was full of elephants, and the Mauryans often exported or gifted numbers of war elephants to allies.
TeamBonuses.Description: Elephant Units -20% train time (currently not shared).
